responses: Hi there, how can I help?

We are located in the heart of Electronics City. Check this out: https://www.google.com/maps/place/International+Institute+of+Information+Technology+Bangalore/@12.8447512,77.6632317,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x3ad86af40d2ac611?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjR6Yap7eTmAhVrxDgGHe0XB-EQ_BIwHnoECAsQCg
IIIT-B is in Electronics City, opposite to Infosys
You will have to check Academia for this. Last year's cut-off was ~10,900
iiitb.in is our portal for everything IIITB!
